ModInfo.Name: xce (ZH)
ModInfo.Author: Sheepy
ModInfo.Description:
Chinese (Traditional) Translation for Xenonauts Community Edition v0.34.2.
Includes all X:CE mods that are enabled by default.
This mod translates and should be placed above the following mods:
Aegis Armor, Armoured Assault, Extended Weapon Descriptions for Fighters, Geographic addition, Lore+, X:CE Balance Adjustment, and X:CE Base Mod.
See mod home for exact version of translated mods: https://github.com/Sheep-y/xenonauts-ce_zh
